title: Titanfall 2, Nintendo Switch, and Star Wars - Kinda Funny Gamescast Ep. 93
description:
Greg reviews Titanfall 2, we predict the Nintendo Switch Presentation, Shadow of the Tomb Raider gets leaked, and we talk about Star Wars Battlefront 2 single player. (Released to Patreon Supporters 11.04.16)

Thanks to Video Blocks for sponsoring this episode. Go to http://www.videoblocks.com/gamescast2016

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
